thread.title: River City Steel Services
thread.title_full: Servicecaster reviewed by River City Steel Services

author: River City Steel Services
title: River City Steel Services
text: I ordered casters online. When they arrived, they didn't fit into my office chair properly. I called customer service, who immediately issued the return authorization and advised me to ship an example of the caster I needed replaced along with my return. The post on my caster turned out to be a unusual size, which they could get even though it wasn't listed online. And the cost for the "special order" was still very reasonable.
